name: Bicep Curl
instructions: Hold a dumbbell in each hand with palms facing up. Curl the dumbbells while keeping your elbows close to your torso.

name: Concentration Curl
instructions: Sit on a bench with your legs apart. Hold a dumbbell with one hand, lean forward, and curl the dumbbell while keeping your elbow stationary.

name: Chin-Up
instructions: Grab a pull-up bar with palms facing you. Pull yourself up until your chin is above the bar, then slowly lower yourself back down.

name: Cable Bicep Curl
instructions: Stand facing a cable machine. Hold the cable handle with an underhand grip and curl it while keeping your elbows stationary.
